Posts.Content: caseydallen wrote: Hi, I am a mother of a beautiful 2 year old and am currently 9 weeks pregnant with my second child.  Last weekend while on vacation, I noticed a hard, strange lump in my right breast just slightly above my nipple.  Also, my right breast seems to be larger than the other.  There is some pain in that area as well.  My husband felt and agreed that it was very strange for me.  I went to my OB today out of worry.  He scheduled an ultrasound for this afternoon, and I must say I am scared out of my witts!  He did say however before I left his office that it seems to be about 2cm?  Can anyone offer/share their experiances of their "lump" discoveries and what the results turned out as?  Or any words of incouragement?  Thanks everyone!
